name: Asset Purchase Agreement (APA - Ghana)
description: Template for the sale and purchase of business assets in Ghana, including goodwill and employee transfer considerations.

clauses.clause_text: THIS ASSET PURCHASE AGREEMENT is made between {{vendor_name}} ('the Vendor') and {{purchaser_name}} ('the Purchaser') on {{completion_date}}.
The Vendor sells and the Purchaser purchases the following assets: {{list_of_assets}} (the 'Purchased Assets'), including goodwill, intellectual property, and equipment.
The total purchase price for the Assets is {{purchase_price}} (GHS). The allocation of the price among the Assets is set out in Schedule 1.

The parties agree to comply with Section 65 of Act 651 regarding the transfer of employees. The Purchaser {{shall_or_shall_not}} offer employment to the existing employees of the Vendor listed in Schedule 2.
The Vendor warrants that (a) it has good title to the Assets; (b) the Assets are free from any encumbrances; (c) there are no pending litigations affecting the Assets.
All income and outgoings (including utility bills and ground rent) related to the Assets shall be apportioned between the Vendor and the Purchaser as of the Completion Date.
